title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 94.2 - Borrowings for purposes other than repaying shareholders and depositors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 94.2 - Borrowings for purposes other than repaying shareholders and depositors

State Regulations
A savings and loan association may borrow money for purposes
other than repaying shareholders and depositors, and pledge its assets as
security for the repayment thereof, in amounts not exceeding 50 percent of its
assets. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
94.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
